notes: When a [[Shiversleep]] is hypnotized, it believes itself to be a butterfly: the Shimmying Butterfly.
sounds: Dance, endless dance, dance the endless.
name: Shimmying Butterfly
behaviour: Follows its target around but does not harm them.
location: [[Roshamuul Cistern]], enclosed cavern, appears when using [[Pendulum]] on [[Shiversleep]] and [[Broken Dream]]s on [[Half-Buried Face]]s.
strategy: Leave them alone. If you kill them, the [[Dream Butterfly]] will curse you (very minor damage) when you next speak to it.
